ListeningManager¶

class ListeningManager.ListeningManager(maxListening=1)[source]¶

This class is the main operator.

Parameters:maxListening – Listening worker number limit

Note

It creates also 3 fields to handle the pids of processing threads

destroy()[source]¶

Destroy all the listening threads (Safe exit)

updateListening()[source]¶

This method updates the listening list. Called just after the updateNetworkTable().

updateNetworkTable(table)[source]¶

This method sets the network table.

Parameters:table – The updated network list
class ListeningManager.WEPListening(box)[source]¶

WEPListening is a specific class to handle the cracking of a Wifibox which uses WEP security

Parameters:box – The box to crack

Note

It creates also 3 fields to handle the pids of processing threads

speed_up_process(box)[source]¶
startListening()[source]¶
stopListening()[source]¶
update()[source]¶
class ListeningManager.WPAListening(box)[source]¶

WPAListening is a specific class to handle the cracking of a Wifibox which uses WPA security

Parameters:box – The box to crack

Note

It creates also 2 fields to handle the pids of processing threads
